meanings.definition: A speech or piece of writing that praises someone or something highly.
meanings.sent1: During the graduation ceremony, the principal delivered a heartfelt eulogiums for the students.
meanings.sent2: The book received glowing eulogiums from critics for its captivating storyline.
meanings.sent3: At the talent show, the cat gave an unexpected eulogiums for its favorite toy mouse.
meanings.sent4: Her eulogiums for the fallen hero painted a vivid picture of his bravery and sacrifice.
meanings.sent5: The eulogiums at the memorial service left a lasting impression on everyone present.

meanings.definition: The act of praising someone or something highly.
meanings.sent1: The eulogiums of the teacher inspired the students to work harder.
meanings.sent2: Public figures often receive eulogiums for their charitable work.
meanings.sent3: The eulogiums of the dog for its favorite treat was quite amusing to watch.
meanings.sent4: The eulogiums of the sun as it set behind the mountains was truly breathtaking.
meanings.sent5: Her eulogiums of the ancient ruins brought history to life for the listeners.
